A plain and short discourse concerning the nature of the Lord's Supper, and the end of celebrating it to which is added, A paraphrase of all those places in the New Testament, wherein the Lord's Supper is mentioned / by John Jeffery ... Jeffery, John, 1647-1720.
31, [1] p.
Printed for W. Rogers ..., London : 1699.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library. "A paraphrase upon all the places of the New Testament in which the Lord's Supper is mentioned" has caption title. Advertisement: p. [1] at end.
=======

31, [1] p.
Printed for W. Rogers ..., London : 1699.
